thread.title: Peugeot to build new van at UK Vauxhall plant

title: Peugeot to build new van at UK Vauxhall plant
text:
Peugeot to build new van at UK Vauxhall plant 8:52pm IST - 01:50 
French auto-maker Peugeot will boost output at its English Vauxhall van plant by around two thirds from next year onwards, including new Peugeot and Citroen models, in a show of confidence in its British brand a year before Brexit. Ciara Lee
